dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4291 IH: To direct the United States Postal Service to modify the ZIP Code for Goose Creek, South Carolina, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Mace introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To direct the United States Postal Service to modify the ZIP Code for Goose Creek, South Carolina, and for other purposes.

section.header: ZIP Code modification for Goose Creek, South Carolina
section.text: Not later than 45 days after the date of enactment of this section, the United States Postal Service shall modify the boundaries of the ZIP Code applicable to Goose Creek, South Carolina, to conform with the boundaries set forth in the map titled ZIP Code Boundaries Proposal 1, dated June 7, 2023, published by the City of Goose Greek GIS Department.
